    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Theories of International Relations &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Aug 17, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/theoriesir
     </span>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17117379">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17117379">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17117379">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Identifying a Question: Selected Resources for Topic Idea Development
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117379">
          <p>
           <strong>
            News&nbsp;
           </strong>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <em>
             <strong>
              Browse:
             </strong>
            </em>
           </p>
           <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
            <a href="http://www.bbc.com/">
             BBC
            </a>
           </p>
           <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
            <a href="https://news.google.com/">
             Google News
            </a>
           </p>
           <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
            <a href="http://www.mondotimes.com/">
             Mondo Times
            </a>
            <br />
            Links to local media in the United States and worldwide, including newspaper, TV stations, news radio stations, and online news sources.
           </p>
           <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
            <a href="http://www.nytimes.com/">
             New York Times
            </a>
           </p>
           <p>
            <em>
             <strong>
              Search:
             </strong>
            </em>
           </p>
           <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic">
             LexisNexis Academic
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts, as well as business publications, legal materials, and more. Full text is linked directly in the database.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17117379" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17117380">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17117380">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17117380">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Articles: Databases &amp; Indexes
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117380">
          <p>
           <b>
            Subject-Specific Databases (Scholarly)
           </b>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.ciaonet.org/">
             Columbia International Affairs Online (CIAO)
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of scholarly journal articles, working papers, policy briefs, conference proceedings, and more in the area of international affairs theory and research. Full text is linked directly in the database.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/pais/ip?accountid=40980">
             PAIS
            </a>
            <br />
            Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, policy briefs, government publications, and more from on domestic and international political, economic, social and public policy issues. Use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/wpsashell/ip?accountid=40980">
             Worldwide Political Science Abstracts
            </a>
            <br />
            Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, policy briefs, government publications, and more in political science and complementary fields, including international relations, law, and public administration/policy. Use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
           <b>
            Interdisciplinary Databases (Scholarly and News)
           </b>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
             Academic Search Complete
             <br />
            </a>
            A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including political science. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/">
             JSTOR
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of scholarly journals for most academic disciplines. The most recent three to five years of most journals are not included. Full text is linked directly in the database.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic">
             LexisNexis Academic
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts, as well as business publications, legal materials, and more. Full text is linked directly in the database.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm">
             Omnifile
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of scholarly and non-scholarly journals covering various subjects including general sciences, humanities, social sciences, and business. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17117380" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18469840">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18469840">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18469840">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How Do I Get the Full Text of My Article?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10536644">
          <p>
           To get the full text of an article, consider the following options:
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you are in Encompass Search or a library database, look for "Check for Full Text buttons," "Access Online," or "Check eResources" buttons. These buttons will take you the full text of the article or tell you that the full text cannot be found. If the full text is not available from Trexler Library, look for buttons to request the item from another library via interlibrary loan. Or go directly to the
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           request forms.
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you have citation information for the article (i.e., journal title, article title, publication year, etc.), type the information about your article in
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           on the library website. If the library subscribes to the full text, you will be directed to the article (see first bullet above). If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           - If Trexler Library does not have access to the full text of the article, search
           <a href="http://www.google.com/scholar">
            Google Scholar
           </a>
           by article title to see if the author has made a copy freely available online. If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10536644" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17117397">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17117397">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17117397">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Data and Statistics: Selected Resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117397">
          <p>
           <em>
            African Development Bank Group: African Statistical Yearbook
           </em>
           <br />
           Online Location:
           <a href="http://www.afdb.org/en/documents/publications/african-statistical-yearbook/#">
            http://www.afdb.org/en/documents/publications/african-statistical-yearbook/#
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <i>
            Europa World Year Book
           </i>
           <br />
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.europaworld.com">
            http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.europaworld.com
           </a>
           or search Encompass Search by title
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Global Corruption Report
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.transparency.org/research/gcr">
            http://www.transparency.org/research/gcr
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            ICPSR (Inter-University Consortium for Political and Social Research)
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.icpsr.umich.edu/index.html">
            http://www.icpsr.umich.edu/index.html
           </a>
           <br />
           ICPSR maintains a data archive of more than 500,000 files of research in the social sciences. It hosts 16 specialized collections of data in education, aging, criminal justice, substance abuse, terrorism, and other fields.&nbsp; Full access available only to Muhlenberg faculty, students, and staff who create accounts using their Muhlenberg email addresses.
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            International Historical Statistics, 1750-2000
           </em>
           <br />
           Trexler Library Reference 310 M681i v.1-3
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            International Statistical Agencies
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.census.gov/population/international/links/stat_int.html">
            http://www.census.gov/population/international/links/stat_int.html
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            The Least Developed Countries Report
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://unctad.org/en/Pages/ALDC/Least%20Developed%20Countries/The-Least-Developed-Countries-Report.aspx">
            http://unctad.org/en/Pages/ALDC/Least%20Developed%20Countries/The-Least-Developed-Countries-Report.aspx
           </a>
           &nbsp;
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            OFFSTATS: Official Statistics on the Web (University of Auckland)
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.offstats.auckland.ac.nz/">
            http://www.offstats.auckland.ac.nz/
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            PEW Research Center
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.pewresearch.org/">
            http://www.pewresearch.org/
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/statistical">
             ProQuest Statistical Insight
            </a>
           </em>
           <br />
           Search statistics produced by the U.S. goverment back to 1973. Sources include international intergovernmental organizations, professional and trade organizations, commercial publishers, independent research organizations, state government agencies, and universities.
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            United Nations
           </em>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
           </em>
           <em>
            Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific:
           </em>
           Publications
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.unescap.org/publications">
            http://www.unescap.org/publications
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific: Research and Data&nbsp;
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.unescap.org/stat/data/">
            http://www.unescap.org/stat/data/
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Human Development Reports
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://hdr.undp.org/">
            http://hdr.undp.org/
           </a>
           (1990- )
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
           </em>
           <em>
            Statistics Division
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://unstats.un.org/unsd/default.htm">
            http://unstats.un.org/unsd/default.htm
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Statistical Yearbook
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://unstats.un.org/unsd/syb/default.htm">
            http://unstats.un.org/unsd/syb/default.htm
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Statistical Yearbook for Latin America and the Caribbean
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.eclac.org/cgi-bin/getProd.asp?xml=/deype/agrupadores_xml/aes250.xml&amp;xsl=/agrupadores_xml/agrupa_listado-i.xsl&amp;base=/tpl-i/top-bottom.xsl">
            http://www.eclac.org/cgi-bin/getProd.asp?xml=/deype/agrupadores_xml/aes250.xml&amp;xsl=/agrupadores_xml/agrupa_listado-i.xsl&amp;base=/tpl-i/top-bottom.xsl
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            World Bank
           </em>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
           </em>
           <em>
            Africa Development Indicators
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://data.worldbank.org/data-catalog/africa-development-indicators">
            http://data.worldbank.org/data-catalog/africa-development-indicators
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Data
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://data.worldbank.org/">
            http://data.worldbank.org/
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Data Bank
            <br />
           </em>
           <a href="http://databank.worldbank.org/data/home.aspx">
            http://databank.worldbank.org/data/home.aspx
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            World Health Organization
           </em>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Data
            <br />
           </em>
           <a href="http://www.who.int/gho/en/">
            http://www.who.int/gho/en/
            <em>
             <br />
            </em>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Global Health Atlas
            <br />
           </em>
           <a href="http://apps.who.int/globalatlas/">
            http://apps.who.int/globalatlas/
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Pan American Health Organization: Data
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.paho.org/hq/index.php?option=com_content&amp;view=article&amp;id=2470&amp;Itemid=2003&amp;lang=en">
            http://www.paho.org/hq/index.php?option=com_content&amp;view=article&amp;id=2470&amp;Itemid=2003&amp;lang=en
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            World Military Expenditures and Arms Transfers
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://purl.access.gpo.gov/GPO/LPS33981">
            http://purl.access.gpo.gov/GPO/LPS33981
           </a>
           (current issues) and
           <a href="http://purl.access.gpo.gov/GPO/LPS4526">
            http://purl.access.gpo.gov/GPO/LPS4526
           </a>
           (archived issues)
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            World Trade Organization, Trade Statistics
           </em>
           <br />
           <a href="http://www.wto.org/english/res_e/statis_e/statis_e.htm">
            http://www.wto.org/english/res_e/statis_e/statis_e.htm
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17117397" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21695156">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21695156">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21695156">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Your Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21681476">
          <p>
           For information on using
           <strong>
            Chicago Style
           </strong>
           , see the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357836&amp;sid=2978374">
            Political Science Subject Guide: Citations
           </a>
           tab.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21681476" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4652354" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox18469836">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18469836">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18469836">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need Help with Your Research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117745">
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           <b>
            Jen Jarson
           </b>
           <br />
           Social Sciences Reference Librarian
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3552
           <br />
           email: jarson@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17117745" class="boxatt">
